title: Chloe Ferry puts on a bleary-eyed display as she enjoys wild night out in Newcastle
text:
She's become one of Geordie Shore's most popular stars and often shows off her wild side on her raucous nights out.

And Chloe Ferry looked like she was having the time of her life as she enjoyed her third night out in a row with her pal Bethan Kershaw in Newcastle on Saturday.

The Geordie Shore star, 24, put on a bleary-eyed display as she made her way from club to club, first parting in Jalou before heading to Bijoux.

Good time: Chloe Ferry, 24, looked like she was having the time of her life as she enjoyed her third night out in a row in Newcastle on Saturday

Party: The Geordie Shore star made her way from club to club, first parting in Jalou before heading to Bijoux

Chloe ensured all eyes were on her for the evening with her daring ensemble with the reality star sporting a blue bodycon dress.

The TV star added height to her frame with a pair of thigh-high white boots while she let her platinum blonde locks fall loose down her shoulders.

Looking in high spirits as she made her way through the city streets, Chloe accessorised with a black handbag and hoop earrings.

The MTV beauty was clearly having a good time as she made her way from one nightclub to the next and at one point was carried in the street by a male partygoer.

Helping hand: The MTV beauty was at one point was carried in the street by a male partygoer

Meanwhile, Chloe's pal Bethan donned a pink mini-dress for the evening with a plunging neckline.

She paired it with strappy heels and also sported long diamond earrings.

The Geordie Shore star went all-out for her night on the town and took a tumble with another female pal on the street.

The outing comes after Chloe revealed that she has finally called it quits on her relationship with Sam Gowland for good following their turbulent romance.

Style: Chloe ensured all eyes were on her for the evening with her daring ensemble with the reality star sporting a blue bodycon dress

Eye-catching: The TV star added height to her frame with a pair of thigh-high white boots

Look: Chloe let her platinum blonde locks fall loose down her shoulders for her night out

Pal: Chloe partied with a number of friends including her Geordie Shore co-star Bethan Kershaw

Low profile: Chloe tried to hide her face as she was carried by a male friend outside the club

Raucous: Bethan took a tumble in the street as she was helped up by her friends

Chloe confirmed her single status following speculation that the former couple had rekindled their relationship during a recent trip to Dubai.

The couple went public with their romance in October 2017 but split in May earlier this year after she accused him of cheating with Love Island beauty Amber Davies, something she vehemently denied.

Setting the record straight on their relationship, Chloe told The Sun: 'I'm going back into Geordie Shore house in three days. I am single. I am excited about getting started.

TV star: Chloe has become one of Geordie Shore's most popular stars and often shows off her wild side on her raucous nights out

Fashion: Chloe completed her look with a black handbag and hoop earrings

'When you're going through a hard time it's good to be around positive energy. My mum's been supportive, she is amazing.'

Chloe apparently worried her friends last month when she was spotted arriving at the airport with Sam on a trip to Dubai.

A source told the website at the time: 'They've gone to Dubai. Her friends think she's crazy and just doing it to stop Sam from taking legal action against her.

It's over! Chloe recently revealed that she has finally called it quits on her relationship with Sam Gowland for good following their turbulent romance

Moving on: The Geordie Shore star confirmed her single status following speculation that the former couple had rekindled their relationship during a trip to Dubai (pictured)

'Chloe knows it's a toxic relationship but said she's willing to give it another try.'

However Sam made it clear he had moved on from her for good as he had her face tattoo on his leg covered up.

Taking to Instagram last week, the reality star showed off his new inking of a very large bear on his thigh in a video, captioning it: 'Cover up on thigh, leg sleeve pending.'

Rocky road: The couple went public with their romance in October 2017 but split in May earlier this year after she accused him of cheating with Love Island beauty Amber Davies, something she denies (pictured in May 2018)

The large tattoo covered the previous one of Chloe's face, which he obtained when appearing on Just Tattoo Of Us.

At the time, the star was furious with his ex, exclaiming: 'Why the f**k did you do that for?'

While Chloe, who initially picked the design so she could c**k block her partner, admitted some regret about her choice adding: 'I am regretting it a little bit now. I didn't think it would be that big!'

However, the tattoo is no longer a problem for Sam as he now sports a huge inking of a roaring bear on his leg.

Single baby! Setting the record straight on their relationship, Chloe told The Sun: 'I'm going back into Geordie Shore house in three days. I am single. I am excited about getting started.'

Their relationship came crashing to an end when she dumped him after accusing him of cheating with Love Island beauty Amber, which she denies.

Things turned bitter between the pair when Chloe took to Instagram to accuse him of having sex with Amber, which they both sternly denied.

The star shared alleged messages between her ex Sam and Amber which she claims proves they had sex, despite the pair's denials.

Amber then took to Instagram to deny sleeping with Sam, and gave an explanation for the messages shared.
